mapper.select: select * from T_CLOSE_DETAIL where id in (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id FROM T_CLOSE_DETAIL where id BETWEEN #{id1} and #{id2}) AS temp)
select * from T_CLOSE_DETAIL where busi_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
select DISTINCT fund_account_id,trade_account_id,client_id from T_CLOSE_DETAIL where encrypt_lable = 0
select count(*) from T_CLOSE_DETAIL where busi_date = DATE_FORMAT((CURDATE() - interval 1 day),"%Y%m%d")
mapper.update: UPDATE T_CLOSE_DETAIL A INNER JOIN TCD_encrypt_temp B ON A.fund_account_id = B.TCD_B_fundaccountId and A.trade_account_id = B.TCD_B_tradeaccountId and A.client_id = B.TCD_B_clientId SET A.fund_account_id = B.TCD_A_fundaccountId,A.trade_account_id=B.TCD_A_tradeaccountId,A.client_id=B.TCD_A_clientId,A.encrypt_lable=1 WHERE A.encrypt_lable=0 and A.id IN (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id FROM T_CLOSE_DETAIL where id BETWEEN #{id1} and #{id2}) AS temp);

UPDATE T_CLOSE_DETAIL A inner join TCD_encrypt_temp B ON A.fund_account_id = B.TCD_B_fundaccountId and A.trade_account_id = B.TCD_B_tradeaccountId and A.client_id = B.TCD_B_clientId SET A.fund_account_id = B.TCD_A_fundaccountId,A.trade_account_id=B.TCD_A_tradeaccountId,A.client_id=B.TCD_A_clientId,A.encrypt_lable=1 where A.id in (select id from (select id from T_CLOSE_DETAIL where encrypt_lable=0) AS temp)
